We are excited to announce that our oyster nursery locations in #TyneandWear are... Sunderland Marina and @PortofBlyth! Thanks to both sites for hosting us, and to our delivery partners @GWKNE & @EnvAgencyYNE, helping to restore oysters in North East England. #WildOysters üôå https://t.co/T5cSTp2Z2c

300,000 homes in England are now better protected against flooding. 27,000 of those homes are in the South West, including the  #Helston flood alleviation scheme in #Cornwall which provides increased protection for 121 homes. #FCERM #TeamEA https://t.co/1z6QDFYyBo https://t.co/qqAk6vI7Y3

tweets.text: @GarethFarr1 @NickMott7 @EnvAgencyMids @NaturalEngland @UKGWForum @NE_WestMids Looks like its a Holocene age deposit some of the tufa has been radiocarbon dated....& accumulated over the last 6700 years & is still forming see this link page 25 onwards for an interest article from the Woolhope Field Club Transactions 2000: https://t.co/Dko3fuWbqy

Today 1,269 oysters are being placed in North East England estuarine waters! 810 housed at Sunderland and 459 at Blyth. These oysters will release over 3 billion oyster larvae into local coastal waters over the next 3 years! #SeedTheSea #OceanRecovery #WildOysters https://t.co/4Mm436rHYD

tweets.text:
We‚Äôve delivered our largest ever programme of #flood and coastal defence improvements!

Working with partners, we‚Äôve helped protect over 300,000 homes from flooding and supported communities to become more resilient to #ClimateChange

Read more: https://t.co/5Bgax4pg9n

#FCERM https://t.co/mS2pKBFb18

In 2015 the @EnvAgency set a target to better protect 300,000 homes from the risk of flooding by March 2021. We are thrilled to be a part of that milestone. The fully operational #BostonBarrier better protects 13,732 properties from tidal flooding in Boston! #FCERM #TeamEA https://t.co/hXgNEhSWZk

urls.title: ¬£7m flood defence scheme in Croston 'already proved its worth'
urls.description: Croston's ¬£7m flood defence scheme has already paid for itself by preventing massive damage to homes and other properties in the Lancashire village.

tweets.text:
This ingenious scheme works - and protects properties @EnvAgencyNW 
https://t.co/HXnt9zEhE9

Have you spotted our #flood and coastal risk manager for #Lancashire @AndynBrown16 in @leponline? Andy was discussing how the ¬£7m Croston Flood Risk Management scheme has contributed to our 300,000 homes better protected milestone! 

Read all about it below‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/p1KOwu8pOo

We did it! Today we pass the target of 300000 homes better protected from flooding. Massive congrats to all involved. Here‚Äôs a taster of just four of the 700 schemes that were part of that success - but can you name them? https://t.co/5xFUVds5wU https://t.co/xtz5gGxeY6

Yorkshire makes up more than a quarter of the national 300K homes better protected.
 
A great achievement üëè 

#FCERM #Flood #ClimateChange https://t.co/EpeTBZWbf0
@lepdavidnowell @EnvAgencyNW Thanks David for joining me in the outside world yesterday! Thanks for this piece to celebrate this great work by #Lancashire councils & the @EnvAgency

Delighted to have secured a debate in Parliament next week on the campaign to stop @bradfordmdc council's plans for an incinerator on the outskirts of #Keighley.

Despite top campaigning by the @AireIncinerator team, the @EnvAgency granted permission last year.üëé

Find out moreüëá https://t.co/H3ugIc8L37

This ingenious scheme works - and protects properties @EnvAgencyNW 
https://t.co/HXnt9zEhE9

Today, we have hit our target of protecting more than 300,000 homes nationally from the risk of #flooding & coastal erosion! 

Here are our local flood risk managers to explain what we have achieved in the #NorthWest & what we will do to protect communities in the next 6 years https://t.co/mNV3dnmPfJ

@EnvAgencyMids Many of us working on EA projects have lived and breathed the 300,000 homes target for the last few years. In delivering the Isle of Axholme‚Äôs Strategic Keadby PS Renewal I‚Äôm proud to have played a part in achieving it. https://t.co/6VeJC7y0gQ
